website_summaries.verdict: This foaming cleanser effectively cleans skin without drying or tightening. Perfect for Everyday use.
pros: Foaming cleanser lathers beautifully and a little product goes a long way
Product leaves skin feeling clean without added tightness or dryness
Cleanser also effectively removes makeup residue with no harsh scrubbing
cons: Excess product can dry and clog the dispenser, always be sure to wipe clean after each use

customer_reviews.title: Foamy, GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I avoid soap but love foam when washing my face. This stuff is great. The dispenser is a little awkward, in terms of getting the liquid onto your hands. Needs a redesign. I have sensitive skin and it is mildly irritating, but that is me, I suspect. Nice clean face, highly recommended. Not drying.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hirschhorn

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with the results from using this. My face feels extremely clean every time I use it. Very gentle and refreshing! You can use it to clean makeup brushes as well. I will definitely be buying more when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great facial cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: Per my wife, who I bought this for: I have minor breakouts on my face that just seem to not want to go away. That is until I got this product! I have been so impressed with how clean and soft my skin feels after using the Calendula Face wash. It doesn't dry my skin out and I use it daily. It has cleared up my skin. I am on the well seasoned side of life, so a product that works so well for me is a keeper. I highly recommend Calendula Deep Cleaning Foaming Face Wash.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Trezza

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this face cleaner! Only a pea size drop is necessary and it leaves my skin feeling conditioned, soft, and clean. I have tried many face cleaners before, including ones much more expensive, and this one is by far the best.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Awful scent.
customer_reviews.text: The previous bottles I purchased directly from Kiehl’s had a pleasant scent. The odor of the fluid in this bottle smells stale. I would not recommend purchasing from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Niles02

customer_reviews.title: More convenient to buy from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for awhile now. It’s just as effective as buying direct from a Kheils outlet. I used to have to go to Dillard’s to buy it which was inconvenient for me. Now I just buy from here.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great and Works
customer_reviews.text: With combination skin, I am always struggling to find a cleanser that doesn't over dry or over moisturize. This is it! It works great, especially when combined with the accompanying toner.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Taylor-Booth

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleanser. I have dry, sensitive skin and it doesn’t irritate my face or dry it out. Cleans thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money, you will be glad you invested in beautiful skincare.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for combination skin and skin that is prone to breakouts in spring and summer. Pea size drop does the trick. Should last through fall. Love this product. Well worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen C Brownworth

customer_reviews.title: OMG I’m so beautiful now!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS! Got it for Christmas and my skin is already glowy and the smell is to die for. Love love love
customer_reviews.author: Sara Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful skin
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for about three years and my skin is beautiful! So gentle on the skin too! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Angelia R Bethea

customer_reviews.title: Khiel's is a gentle yet effective skincare line.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for a couple of years now and its wonderful. I have sensitive oily skin and it's a good product for all skin types.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Velandia

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite face wash! The product lasts a long time, as it takes very little to foam up nicely and do a thorough job of washing my face without making it feel dry.
customer_reviews.author: JHM

customer_reviews.title: Best cleanser ever!
customer_reviews.text: This not only cleans well, it leaves your skin moist, and doesn’t strip away the natural oils. And it smells very fresh and natural! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Christy S Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Cleans without drying
customer_reviews.text: Very concentrated! Literally, you only need one drop to cleanse your face without drying. One bottle lasts me 9 months!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS STUFF!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t really need to use anything else. It makes my face feel good. It feel like luxury going on and my face feels clean afterwards. I don’t leave it on my face that long and I put it on in the shower. I might try and leave it on longer and come back and update the review.
customer_reviews.author: EdAmazon

product_meta.title: Calendula Deep Cleansing Foaming Face Wash 230 ml. (Original Version)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars72 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
